page.title: 14KENNELS AND CATTERY
page.content: rs Wintersgill owns Windmill Farm Kennels on the Wilbarston road.The house was built in 1939,the kennels are two years old.She takes cats from Market Harborough,Wellingborough, Leicester,Kettering and Corby,and surrounding villages. There is room for 8 cats and 10 dogs.They are fed once a day each evening on dried food,meat and biscuits. It takes her over 2 hours to exercise the dogs individually each morning and evening.They run around the compound for an hour at lunch time.The kennels are cleaned out daily,and are heated in the winter. Mrs Wintersgill charges 2 pounds per dog per day,and 1 pound 50 pence per cat.
